Sentencas: Conventional fuel cell stack designs suffer from severe spatial non-uniformity in both temperature and current density.
Titulo: A novel design for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Such variations are known to create damaging thermal stresses within the stack and thus, impact overall lifespan.
Titulo: A novel design for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: In this work, we propose a novel stack design aimed at reducing spatial variations at the source.
Titulo: A novel design for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: We propose a mechanism of distributed fuel feed in which the heat generation profile can be influenced directly.
Titulo: A novel design for solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Simulation results are presented to illustrate the potential of the proposed scheme.
Titulo: A novel design for solid oxide fuel cell stacks
